name: Hopeless (Seeker13)
description:
This platforming game is the sweat of many months and years created with many people of many countries. Being a platformer game, it is natural to be hard but this game might just be harder. You start of the game nice and easy saying that you will finish game in a 10 minutes interval but that my friend is daringly challenging!

This game is highly compressed game which you can download in a jiffy. This platformer game is the one that you can play when you are bored, compete with your friends turn-wise, and most-of-all, you will enjoy the gameplay, new generation Platformer and Role-Playing game.

Thank you!
